column4: I need some help installing some drivers. anyone out there can help me?
thanks. im working on getting the actual ati driver to work. as per the instructions on this page https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI
but when i get to the bash ./ati-driver-installer-<version>.run --buildpkg ubuntu/edgy, it says there is no such file. and there is.
